messages.subject: Request for Samurai Wiki
messages.msgSnippet: Could someone please do an article on Fujii Kogen, Fujiwara no Hidesato, Fujii Tarozaemon (Kogen s brother)---- or maybe just one article on the Fujii family
messages.messageBody:
Could someone please do an article on Fujii Kogen, Fujiwara no
Hidesato, Fujii Tarozaemon (Kogen's brother)---- or maybe just one
article on the Fujii family which includes all the details.



- The Fujii descendancy from Fujiwara Hidesato
- The Fujii's move from east/central Honshu to western Honshu
- The Fujii Kogen's life and death
- Info on his brother Taroemon (who served the Mori, Kogen's enemy)
- Info on how Taroemon fought at Osaka Bay and was part of the
first victory
- Info on how Kogen's child was taken in my the Mimura and how
Kogen's descendents were included in the Mizuno.
- Info on how his brother's kids become monks and/or guardians of
Buddhism
- Etc.etc.etc.


Most of this info can be found summed up (along with the Ka-
Mon) here at :

http://www.www2.harimaya.com/sengoku/html/b_huzi.html

I would really appreciate it.
If no one wants to write it, then what do I have to do to be
allowed to write it ?

Thank you.
